articles.title: 'Harry Potter' star Daniel Radcliffe is expecting first child with longtime girlfriend Erin Darke - Fox News
articles.description: Daniel Radcliffe and his girlfriend of over 10 years Erin Darke are expecting their first child together. The "Harry Potter" star began dating the American actress in 2012.
articles.content:
Daniel Radcliffe and his longtime girlfriend Erin Darke are expecting their first child together, a representative for the "Harry Potter" star confirmed to Fox News Digital.
